text.div:
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
Questionnairehttps://voicecollab.ai/fhir/Questionnaire/VbaiQuestionnaireConfoundersExample#0.1.0
smokingHave you ever smoked regularly (more than a few times a month for at least two months)? This includes tobacco, cannabis, vapes, e-cigarettes, hookah, or pipes.0..1choiceValue Set: Smoking ValueSet
smoking_q2At what age did you start smoking?0..1integerEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke
smoking_q3What age did you stop?0..1integerEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke
smoking_q4Checklist of different types (choose all that apply):0..1open-choiceEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke
Value Set: Smoking types ValueSet
smoking_q5How often do/did you smoke?0..1stringEnable When: smoking = If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke
Value Set: Smoking times ValueSet
smoking_q6Have you been a regular smoker or not within the last 3 years?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
alcoholDo you drink alcohol?0..1choiceValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
alcohol_q2How often do you have at least one drink containing alcohol? Drinks can be beer, wine, shots of liquor, cocktails containing a shot of liquor0..1choiceEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Value Set: Drinking times ValueSet
alcohol_q3How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking? One drink is 12 oz. beer, 5 oz. wine, 1.5 oz. (one shot) liquor0..1integerEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
alcohol_q4How often do you have at least one drink containing alcohol? Drinks can be beer, wine, shots of liquor, cocktails containing a shot of liquor0..1choiceEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Value Set: Drinking number ValueSet
alcohol_q5Have you drunk alcohol today?0..1choiceEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Value Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
alcohol_q6How many drinks did you have?0..1integerEnable When: alcohol_q5 = If Yes
alcohol_q7Have you ever required rehab/counseling for heavy alcohol use?0..1choiceEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Value Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
alcohol_q8Are you currently in recovery for alcohol use?0..1choiceEnable When: alcohol = If Yes
Value Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
substance_useHow many times in the past year have you used a recreational substance or used a prescription medication for nonmedical reasons? (Recreational substances include methamphetamines (speed, crystal), cannabis (marijuana, pot), inhalants (paint thinner, aerosol, glue), tranquilizers (Valium), barbiturates, cocaine, ecstasy, hallucinogens (LSD, mushrooms), or narcotics (heroin). )0..1boolean
substance_use_q2Are you currently in recovery for substance use? 0..1stringValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
substance_use_q3During the past TWO (2) WEEKS, about how often did you use any of the following medicines ON YOUR OWN, that is, without a doctorâ€™s prescription, in greater amounts or longer than prescribed? 0..1string
caffeineHow many 8 oz / 230 ml / small) cups of coffee OR shots of espresso OR caffeinated teas have you had today?0..1integer
hydrationHow many 8 oz / 230 ml / small) cups of water have you had today?0..1integer
hydration_underarm_sweatDo you experience underarm sweat?0..1stringValue Set: Sweat ValueSet
oral_dentalDo you have any oral or dental problems that might affect speech?0..1stringValue Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
oral_dental_q2Please specify ___. Do you currently have any tooth loss, dentures, retainers or braces? 0..1stringEnable When: oral_dental = If Yes
allergies_coldDo you currently have allergies or cold-like symptoms?0..1boolean
tirednessHow tired are you? (0=not tired at all, 10=extremely tired)0..1integer
heightWhat is your height? (ft/m)0..1integer
weightWhat is your weight? (lbs/kg)0..1integer
ent_historyDo you have any of these voice, communication, or hearing conditions or had any of the interventions mentioned below? (check all that apply) 0..1stringValue Set: ENT History ValueSet
ent_history_q2Do you currently have these conditions or currently experience symptoms as a result of having had these conditions or interventions? 0..1stringEnable When: ent_history = If != None
Value Set: Yes/No/Some
ent_history_q3Which ones do you currently have?0..1stringEnable When: ent_history_q2 = only some
ent_history_q4Do you currently receive treatment for these conditions?0..1stringValue Set: Yes/No/Some
ent_history_q5Which ones do you currently receive treatment for?0..1stringEnable When: ent_history_q4 = only some
neurological_historyHave you been diagnosed with any of these neurological health conditions by a clinician? (check all that apply) 0..1stringValue Set: NeurologicalHistory ValueSet
neurological_history_q2Do you currently have these conditions or currently experience symptoms as a result of having had these conditions? 0..1stringEnable When: neurological_history = !=None
Value Set: Yes/No/Some
neurological_history_q3Which ones do you currently have? 0..1stringEnable When: neurological_history_q2 = only some
psychiatric_historyPsychiatric conditions: Have you been diagnosed with any of these mental health conditions by a clinician? (check all that apply) 0..1stringValue Set: Psychiatric History ValueSet
psychiatric_history_q2Do you currently have these conditions? 0..1stringEnable When: psychiatric_history = !=None
Value Set: Yes/No/Some
psychiatric_history_q3Which ones do you currently have?0..1stringEnable When: psychiatric_history_q2 = Only Some
psychiatric_history_q4Do you currently receive treatment for these conditions?0..1stringEnable When: psychiatric_history_q2 = Only Some
Value Set: hl7VS-yes-no-Indicator
physical_health_whodas_2In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did you have in:0..1group
S1Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S2Taking care of your household responsibilities?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S3Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S4How much of a problem did you have joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S5How much have you been emotionally affected by your health problems?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S6Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S7Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S8Washing your whole body?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S9Getting dressed?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S10Dealing with people you do not know?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S11Maintaining a friendship?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
S12Your day-to-day work?0..1choiceValue Set: WHODAS ValueSet
H1Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?0..1integer
H2In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your0..1integer
H3In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?0..1integer
medicationDo you currently take or use any of these medications or substances? Please check all that apply0..1stringValue Set: Medication ValueSet
medication_please_specifyPlease specify ___. 0..1stringEnable When: medication = If Other
menstration_menopauseDo you menstruate?0..1open-choiceValue Set: Menstration MenopauseValueSet
menstration_menopause_please_specifyPlease specify ___. 0..1stringEnable When: menstration_menopause = If Other
vocal_activityDo you do one of these jobs or hobbies that requires using your voice for many hours a day (check all that apply): 0..1stringValue Set: Vocal Activity ValueSet
vocal_activity_not_NoneHow many hours per day do you do this activity with a loud voice or in a loud environment that requires elevating your voice (for instance, a noisy bar or a noisy classroom)?0..1stringEnable When: menstration_menopause = If != None
reading_abilityHow good do you think you are at reading out loud in [English/Spanish/French], that is reading out loud without making mistakes and understanding what you read at a normal rate?0..1stringValue Set: Reading ability ValueSet

Documentation for this format

item.text: Have you ever smoked regularly (more than a few times a month for at least two months)? This includes tobacco, cannabis, vapes, e-cigarettes, hookah, or pipes.
At what age did you start smoking?

enableWhen.answerString: If I used to smoke OR I currently smoke

item.text: What age did you stop?
Checklist of different types (choose all that apply):

item.text: Have you been a regular smoker or not within the last 3 years?
